item.title: CVE-2023-47679|2024-06-06T12:48:16.259Z -- qode%20interactive -- qi%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in QODE Interactive Qi Addons For Elementor allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Qi Addons For Elementor: from n/a through 1.6.3.
